Wim Botha (a mụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ihe n'oge ọhụrụ a.
A mụrụ Botha na Pretoria n'afọ 1974 ma bi ugbu a na Cape Town, South Africa
O tolitere n'obodo dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Pretoria. N'afọ 1996, Botha gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Pretoria na Bachelors na Visual Art
Ọ natara Helgaard Steyn Prize maka ihe banyere ọkpụkpụ n'afọ 2013, Standard Bank Young Artist Award nkè afọ 2005, na Tollman Award nkè afọ 2003.

Botha achọtala mkpalite n'ihe gbasara ọrụ ya na ederede gọọmentị na ihe oyiyi okpukpe, ihe ndị na-egosi nkwenkwe, okwukwe, nlele, mmebi iwu na mgbaghara. Otu n'ime ihe ndị ọ na-eji eme ihe bụ osisi a gwọrọ, akwụkwọ, acrylic enamel paint, oil paint, steel, Indian ink, bronze, paper, na marble.
Onye na-ese ihe na-akọwa; “Ọrụ m bụ usoro distillations...Ha na-anwa ibelata echiche niile na ihe ndị zuru ụwa ọnụ ruo n'echiche ha bụ isi
